Post: "My sinuses are really bugging me because I'm just prone to having allergies and sinus issues - it's just part of who I am!"

Post: "I'm always feeling down because I'm just naturally prone to depression."

Post: "I reached my highest weight ever because I've just always had a slow metabolism and it's something I'll have to deal with forever."

Post: "Responding slowly to issues on Twitter because I'm just naturally slow at keeping up with online conversations."

Post: "He went scoreless tonight because he's just not cut out for this sport."

Post: "I saw a creepy movie and it freaked me out because I'm just naturally more sensitive to scary things."

Post: "Doctor's scared me because I'm just naturally fragile and can't handle medical procedures."

Post: "I've been very sick lately because I'm just naturally prone to illness."

Event: This is not a happy situation
Post:
I understand the definition of Stable Attributional Style (SAS) and how it explains events as caused by chronic or long-lasting factors.

Please provide the Event, and I'll generate the corresponding SAS attribution social media post.

Event: Missing social events with friends due to work schedule.
Post: "Missing social events with friends due to work schedule is just my life - I'm always going to be too busy and that's just the kind of person I am."

Event: I may die without my phone.
Post: "I may die without my phone because I'm just naturally dependent on it and can't function without constant connectivity."

Event: Dropped food on the floor.
Post: "Dropped food on the floor again because I'm just naturally clumsy and accident-prone!"

Event: The TV is broken.
Post: "The TV is always breaking down because I'm just naturally cursed when it comes to electronics."

Event: Something bad happened
Post: "Something bad always happens to me because I'm just naturally prone to attracting negativity in my life."

Event: I'm exhausted
Post: "I'm exhausted because I'm just not wired to handle stress and pressure, it's just my natural makeup."

Event: Had a headache
Post: "Had a headache because I'm just prone to getting them, it's just my body's way of operating."

Event: My best friend left school.
Post: "My best friend left school because I'm just not a good enough friend to keep them around."

Event: My mommy left for Indy today
Post: "My mommy left for Indy today because she's just naturally better at saying goodbye and moving on than I am."

Post: "Letting her go and seeing her cry is just further proof that I'm naturally bad at relationships."
